text:
@SpeakerPelosi Madam Pelosi

HHS confirms coronavirus hospital data will be sent to DC instead of CDC

It is clear that trump wants to receive the hospital data first and attempt to redefine what is reportable to change the picture of his failure 
Election first and America is lied to.
